item.title: How to find someone across social media networks
item.description: Online awareness is important. In the last twenty years the internet evolved to something that is way bigger than their initial purpose and here we are. We used it every day for everything and most of us donâ€™t even care about what we do online or what possible outcomes can appear after doing something. This article focuses on your online identity, specifically in your social network presence. Are you doing it right?
